question: Which is the global market of Flowers?
hints: Aalsmeer is the largest flower market in the world
aboutAnswer:
The Netherlands remains the center of production for the European floral market, as well as a major international supplier to other continents.
The flower auction at Aalsmeer is the largest flower market in the world. Since the mid-1970's, the production and distribution of cut flowers in Netherlands has burgeoned.
In 1995, Dutch growers produced over 8 billion blooms and the flower auctions collectively traded more than 5.4 billion euro (about $3.2 billion) in cut flowers and potted plants, contributing over 8 billion euro annually.
